body_html: Can you only slightly change the code so that it takes an at::Tensor input and benchmarks on this? Then you could create a variable in a different compilation unit and pass it in. Just to make sure it didn't get devirtualized because the numbers are extremely close.
body_text: Can you only slightly change the code so that it takes an at::Tensor input and benchmarks on this? Then you could create a variable in a different compilation unit and pass it in. Just to make sure it didn't get devirtualized because the numbers are extremely close.
body: Can you only slightly change the code so that it takes an `at::Tensor` input and benchmarks on this? Then you could create a variable in a different compilation unit and pass it in. Just to make sure it didn't get devirtualized because the numbers are extremely close.
